cvpiaHabitat
  • Reference

function uses a region to return approx functions for watersheds within it with models

function uses a region to return approx functions for watersheds within it with models

region_spawn_approx(region, species)

Arguments

region

Region name, example "Upper-mid Sacramento River"
species

one of 'fr' (Fall Run), 'sr' (Spring Run), or 'st' (Steelhead)

Value

a list of approx functions obtained from calliong spawning_approx()

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
